rows.label: tlk45300157_04_msg0001
rows.name:
The temperature of the Superbia
Divine Beast suddenly jumped upwards.

rows.label: tlk45300157_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Frankly, we're lucky this facility wasn't
completely blasted away. It's starting to
stabilize again now, thankfully.

rows.label: tlk45300157_04_msg0003
rows.name:
We may have the technology to make
use of the energy the Divine Beast creates, but
that doesn't mean we can control it.

rows.label: tlk45300157_04_msg0004
rows.name:
In the end, we're at the mercy of
the Divine Beast's biology...

rows.label: tlk45300157_04_msg0005
rows.name:
All we can do is pray that the Divine Beast
holds out a bit longer.
